Translations.Text: He bol serve marker for zauzlit koniec world so ona ziaden longer harbor any doubt it Ona nasledovat Mna; this je na pravo chodnicek
Let nie devil zapudit ona; he bol tvoj zapalisty enemy
When Jesus ist proofs he said ja bring ona wisdom clarify some z zalezitost do kto ona dispute Ona reverence GOD obey mna
GOD bol MOJ Lord TVOJ Lord ONA KULT Him alone This je na pravo chodnicek
opponents disputed themselves. Woe do those transgress retribution painful dni
they cakat Hodiny (Dni Judgment pojdem them zrazu when they menej expect it)
Koniec znamy ze dni become enemies z 1 iny except for the righteous
O Moj servants ona have fear dni nor will ona rmutit sa
They bol jeden verit v our revelations bol submitters
Zapisat Raj dohromady tvoj spouses rejoice
Offered them bol zlaty trays salka they zalozit everything srdce desire oci zelat for Ona zivy therein forever
Such je Raj ze ona zdedit chrbat tvoj robota
Ona have it all laskavy z ovocie z kto ona jestn
